feat.value: The blessed Syncletica was asked, 'Is poverty a perfect good?'
She answered, 'It is an exceedingly perfect good for those who are incapable of it.
For those who bear this have suffering in the flesh,
but they have grace in their soul.
Just as clothing is strengthened by being beaten,
and they wash it and twist it violently until it turns white,
in this way the soul is strengthened through poverty, and by necessity they prevail all the more.'
